TEXT.TITLE: AMERICAN WOODMARK <AMWD> TO BUILD PLANT
TEXT.BODY: American Woodmark Corp said it plans to build a 100,000 square foot kitchen cabinet component plant in Toccoa, Ga., with completion expected in the spring of 1988. Reuter
